Elf Archers are rebel elves found in Lletya. After completion of the Regicide quest, slayer masters can assign them as a Slayer task.[1] They are usually killed on task or for teleport crystals used to teleport to Lletya or, upon completion of Song of the Elves, Prifddinas.
